attributes.action: bestow a knighthood on mr.nigel. farage  ukip leader and mep
attributes.additional_details: so he can be included in the government exit committee for clause 50
attributes.background: for his dedication in giving the united kingdom a referendum on the membership of the europeon union

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because it asks for someone to be nominated for an honour. 

Members of the public can nominate people for honours directly. You can find out how to nominate someone for an honour here:

https://www.gov.uk/honours
